review.title: Great Dog Friendly Hotel
review.reviewText: The room was spacious and clean. It was aslo close to the trail.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast was weak.

managementResponses.response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am thrilled that we were able to accommodate your needs with a home away from home experience!  Once more, thank you for posting your review.  We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

review.title: Perfect for our trip
review.reviewText:
We only stayed the night but the bed was very comfortable and shower was hot. The fridge and small kitchen would be great for longer stays and Target is just down the road for groceries. The TV was kinda small and there was no channel guide available. The indoorish pool was nice and heated but needs to be maintained more often. And the small gym was perfect for a quick workout but only 5 pieces of equipment... 2 treadmills, 2 ellipticals, and 1 stationary bike. 
  I did not see any vending machines or ice machines. And if you needed any amenities, then you needed to get them from the front desk.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for writing and telling us about your experience.  We are disappointed to hear that we did not meet your expectations.  Your comments will be useful as we continue to improve our guest experience.  We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better stay in the future.

review.title: Over Priced
review.reviewText: This hotel is over priced and not what you expect for the $200 a night. There was a false sense that there is a breakfast served but it is a few snack items and coffee. The room was dirty with mold in the bathroom, furniture was chipped and surfaces had sticky residue.  The dryer didnt work in the bathroom. It could have been nice if the manager would clean daily and actually serve a breakfast. Very dissappointed.
review.negativeRemarks: Clean daily and serve breakfast. Attention to detail so your guest are provided for and staff is cleaning and doing their job.
review.locationRemarks: The beach and bay are very close.

managementResponses.response: Your review for our hotel was recently brought to my attention.  I am concerned about the housekeeping service issues you mentioned.  We will coach our housekeeping staff on our cleaning procedures in order to provide better service and a comfortable room in the future.  Thank you for your feedback.

review.title: Swept under the bed
review.reviewText: We found a grape, beer bottle cap and wad of hair pushed under the bed

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience during your recent visit to our hotel.  I apologize that our grab-and-go breakfast was not to your expectations.  Still, I am glad you had a satisfactory stay overall.  Your feedback is very important to us, so thank you for sharing.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

review.title: Average place to stay
review.reviewText: The hotel was new enough so it was comfortable, the breakfast grab and go was weak, just some single size granola bars and apples (no variety).
review.positiveRemarks: location to where I had to work and price.
review.negativeRemarks: see above, please offer more for breakfast
review.locationRemarks: on business so no fun had

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property. I am so pleased to hear that we were able to accommodate your needs with our pet friendly policy as well as an early check-in. I’m thrilled you enjoyed all of the amenities our hotel has to offer. Knowing that we accomplished our goal of providing you with a great experience during your stay makes our job so worthwhile! Once more, thank you for posting your review. We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

review.title: Weekend retreat
review.reviewText: I called ahead to the hotel and inquiring whether I could check in early. I was told that I can so I headed there with my family. I knew that there was a swimming pool on site and I knew my niece and nephew would love that. My complaint about the pool is that it contained some dead bugs floating in it but I guess that's understandable since the pool was situated in a partial covered area. I really liked the overall feel of the hotel and the room that I was in. The hotel was quiet and comfortable. The best part of the hotel was that it was dog friendly!
review.negativeRemarks: The pool area. If possible have a full roof so bugs and other stuff doesn't land in the pool.
review.locationRemarks: Close to Target

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your recent review of your stay. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us. We are very disappointed to hear that we did not meet your expectations. We will review the information you have given us and will be conducting a full investigation as well as staff meetings with our maintenance and housekeeping departments in order to prevent these problems you encountered from ever happening again. I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

review.title: Have realistic expectations
review.reviewText:
We needed to stay near Larkspur and Courtyard (with no breakfast) was a rip off.  The dishes are NOT "Non stick" - so cooking was a disaster.   Shower pressure is low, luke warm water and drains were slow.  Outtake fan in bathrooms were filthy and in need of a super clean.

Gym equipment is mostly broken.

But worst part - is that the Expedia website (booking screen) says you can have a sleeper sofa and roll aways or cribs - but hotel says you cannot.  

TV is TINY and does NOT have In Room Movies - something you expect for an "Extended Stay".
review.positiveRemarks: Accessible location to SF, Berkeley and Marin.  Free wifi
review.negativeRemarks: Dishes, Pool towels, equipment, TV's,

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience during your recent visit. Please accept our apologies that your stay with us did not meet our companyâs high standards. We remove dishes and utensils from every room upon check-out so that they can be thoroughly cleaned and sterilized. Regarding the cleanliness issues you mentioned, we will definitely review the information you provided and we will be conducting a full investigation of our elevators. We are checking with our staff and planning a meeting in order to prevent this problem from happening again. Your comments are appreciated as they will help us to provide better service. I do hope that you will return to our hotel, or any other Extended Stay Hotels location in the future.

review.title: Didn't get what i expected for 135.00
review.reviewText: This room was advertised as a suit with kitchen, the hotel didn't even have a wine opener, i asked for glasses and the front disk with a very heavy Spanish accent  replied "no glasses only plastic glasses" terrible service and accommodation. also the elevator were very dirty and smelled like a chemistry terrible smoke smell.
review.negativeRemarks: No Comments
review.locationRemarks: No much! i had to drive to the City.

review.title: Maybe I should have sought out a better hotel
review.reviewText: Front of the building great location is ok I would have loved to have a view with the san Rafael bridge but instead we were placed in front of a highway noise wise you could hear the highway but it was 50/50 depends on the person... the beds made noise a lot everytime anyone moved it was pretty loud spring noises... annoying at night. the bathroom was decent could have had more products. there was a fridge a stove top and a microwave but no dishes to use and no one at the front ever mentioned they could loan you some... so kinda a waste of space... breakfast was not what your thinking no coffe was available muffins in a bag oatmeal in a bag no milk granola bars on the go or fruit if your lucky... definetly lost me on this just showed how cheap they were.
review.positiveRemarks: not much its decent if your looking for a cheap quick place to stay that's it please don't book if your looking for scenes or comfort
review.negativeRemarks: a lot breakfast new beds better TVS less static would be nice more channels more products
review.locationRemarks: golden gate bridge san Francisco the beach etc

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking time in giving us your feedback regarding your recent visit to Extended Stay America San Rafael. Learning that we accomplished our goal of providing you with a good experience during your stay is the best part of our job. I will definitely share your input with our team.

Regarding our fitness room, it's most unfortunate that we were in the process of replacing our equipment. We update and refurbish it as needed, as a matter of fact, we just finished renovating our pool and spa. Our aim is to keep our hotel worthy of the Extended Stay America brand.

We hope to see you again soon, and if I can be of any assistance please let me know. Thank you again.

review.title: Nice but the gym is broken!
review.reviewText: EVERY single thing in the fitness room is broken. What the heek?

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience during your recent stay with us. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us.

We are very disappointed to hear that we did not meet your expectations. We will definitely review the information you have given us and we will be conducting a full investigation and team meeting with the front desk personnel in order to prevent these problems you encountered from ever happening again.

We remove dishes, pots/pans and utensils from every room upon check-out so that they are thoroughly cleaned and sterilized. It is for our guests own protection that we do not allow these items to remain in the room. By the guest notifying the front desk upon check-in or via phone, the front desk clerk will make sure that whatever you need it brought to the room.

Once more we would like to thank you for your comments as they will help us to provide you with better service. It is our company's aim to satisfy our customers totally.

review.title: Cheap!
review.reviewText: There are few options for state-rate hotels in Marin county.Because I had lived in an Extended Stay years back, I expected to have kitchen supplies in the kitchen, towels, coffee pot, flatware, dishes etc. Here ever item had to be requested at the desk. Reception and customer service were lacking. I was greeted by a person not looking at me but saying "I need your ID and credit card." I already had one in my hand but before I could get the second one out, he said again, "I need ID and credit card." It was difficult to not say "If you would look up at your customer, you would see that your second request was unnecessary and even rude."

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. It is great to read that you enjoyed your spacious, quiet, and clean room. I am please that our staff was very helpful and friendly, and that you found us to be a good value. Thank you very much for providing us with your feedback. I do hope that you will return to our hotel, or any of our other brand locations across the U.S. and Canada in the future.

review.title: Extend A Stay America, San Rafael
review.reviewText: Large, clean room. Quiet. Staff helpful and very friendly. Nice alternative to expensive San Francisco hotels.  Easy drive into SF.  While this hotel is a bit shabby, for the price it is a fair deal.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I apologize that we did not meet your expectations during your stay with us. We continually work to improve our hotel, so thank you again for your feedback. We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience in the future.

review.title: Terrible
review.reviewText:
Just completely terrible
Terrible 
Terrible
Terrible
Terrible
Terrible 
Horrible

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking time in giving us your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. I am so glad to read that our hotel and amenities met your needs. It is great to know that you appreciated our location and that you found us to be a great value. I am proud that our staff provided you with friendly service. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America. We hope we have the opportunity to see you again in the future.

review.title: Good place to stay in Marin
review.reviewText: This is a good hotel, no frills and at a very reasonable price.  This is a self serve property for those who are staying in the area for a fair amount of time.  All the normal facilities, quick breakast, fitness center, laundry are available.  So far it has been a very good experience.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to the office and friendly people.
review.negativeRemarks: More fitness equipment.
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco is either a bridge or a ferry boat ride away.  Wine country is up North.  Restaurants and shopping is very close.

managementResponses.response:
I would like to thank you for telling us about your recent visit to Extended Stay America San Rafael. We regret any inconvenience you might have experienced during your stay. We remove the dishes and utensils from every room upon check-out so they are thoroughly cleaned and sterilized. In future, simply notify the front desk of whatever you require and we will make sure it is brought to your room!

Your feedback is extremely valuable to us and we thank you for your positive comments. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to our hotel.

review.title: Pleasant stay
review.reviewText: We prefer to stay at this location every time we visit San Rafael, CA.
review.positiveRemarks: The location near stores, gas stations, and the Richmond Bridge.
review.negativeRemarks: Keep cooking utensils in the rooms.
review.locationRemarks: It's quiet, near a thoroughfare to access other streets to shop.

managementResponses.response: I received a copy of your review, and wanted to take a moment to personally respond. It upsets me to read of what you witnessed in the parking lot of our hotel. I will be sharing your experience with our security staff to prevent your experience from being repeated. We do not condone this and thanks to you will be very vigilant so that this never happens again. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us and we thank you for your comments. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in the area.

review.title: Wiz in the lot :(
review.reviewText: Never have I had drive around a building so that my wife wouldn't have to see one of there guest urinate in the front of a hotel, thanks but no thanks.i'll stay somewhere else.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I apologize that you were not pleased with our grab-and-go breakfast and the smell of our hotel. I will be reviewing your comments with our staff to ensure these issues are not repeated in the future. Thank you again for your feedback. We hope that you will stay at our hotel, or any of our other brand locations in the future.

review.title: THIS PLACE SMELLS LIKE DEATH
review.reviewText: STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS STINKS
review.negativeRemarks: smell was HORRIBLE, breakfast was granola bars, coffee was weak, room décor was depressing.  UGH.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. I am so glad to read that the location of our hotel was so convenient for your needs, and that you enjoyed your stay with us. I am pleased to read that your room was clean and met your needs, and that our staff was friendly and helpful. Thank you very much for sharing your kind feedback. We would love to welcome you back in the future to provide you with another comfortable stay.

review.title: Great location for exploring Marin County!
review.reviewText: Our party of three spent two nights here exploring Marin County.  Short drive to Muir Woods, Muir and Stinson Beaches and Golden Gate National Recreational Area.  Nice walking paths with bay views for a stroll and exercise just a block away.  The room was nice and clean, included a mini kitchen w/full size refrigerator, microwave.  Hotel staff very friendly and helpful.  Dog friendly too!  I will definitely be back and recommend this location!
review.negativeRemarks: My only complaint was not having a list of local restaurants/eateries, stores, etc.  It would be MOST helpful and save staff time!
review.locationRemarks: Beaches, walking paths, San Francisco, scenic coastal drive on HWY 1, Muir Woods National Monument redwoods.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your stay. I am so sorry to read about the cleanliness issues in your room and in our common areas. I have scheduled an emergency meeting with the our housekeeping staff to review our cleanliness standards to ensure that your experience is not repeated. Thank you very much for bringing this to our attention. We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

review.reviewText: The place needs a good cleanning. The room was not well vacuumed and hair remained from the previous guest in the bathroom. The elevators were dirty as well. Dust balls in the corners and ad signs in the elevators with graffitti but no ads. The place needs a complete going over.
review.negativeRemarks: Clean it

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time in giving us your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. I am so pleased that you found your room to be spacious and clean. As well, I am glad to read that our laundry facility was convenient and easy to use. Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us. We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

review.title: Large and clean room
review.reviewText: I have stayed at Extended Stay in San Rafael multiple times.  The rooms are large and clean.  Facilities like the laundry room are conveniently organized and accessible.  I stay at the San Rafael Extended Stay because it is close to Bay West Ballroom up the street and will stay again in the future.
review.positiveRemarks: It is conveniently located for me and the rooms are clean and roomy.
review.negativeRemarks: There isn't anything that needs any major changes.
review.locationRemarks: Bay West Ballroom is half a mile up the street.  It is a nice place to dance socially and also take lessons.

managementResponses.response: I would like to thank you for telling us about your recent stay with us. I appreciate your kind comments about our staff and location; however, I do apologize that your bed was so uncomfortable. Your feedback on this comfort issue will be useful to us as we continually work to improve our hotel. Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

review.title: Great staff, horrible bed
review.reviewText: Location was great, staff was amazing and amenities were so so. The bed and pillows were very uncomfortable, did not sleep very well and I can usually sleep anywhere.  The shower was nice and the overall hotel very clean. I do t think I will stay there because of lack if sleep.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time in giving us your feedback regarding your recent visit to to our hotel. We are pleased to read that we were able to provide you with a clean and cozy room at a convenient location. Thank you so much for your positive review. We look forward to seeing you again in the very near future. Thank you again.

review.title: Great room
review.reviewText: Very clean, cozy, room very complete close to everything.

review.title: Great staff, Good location, save $$ with kitchen
review.reviewText: Good place to stay for exploring Marin County and San Francisco. Not the nicest hotel in the world, but it was a good base for 3-4 days and I would have no reservations going back. This was our best price point option in the area, but it is over priced, as is almost all of California. The kitchenette allowed us to use this an alternative to renting a house on VRBO.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff was extremely helpful - one employee in particular would drop everything to help with little things like printing out directions.
review.negativeRemarks: Facilities could be a little nicer,but ESA Hotels are what they are. As a chain, I don't think ESA hotels are as nice as some others.
review.locationRemarks: Good  base for exploring Muir Woods, Point Reyes, & San Francisco.

review.title: Staff & room were nice however--- NO WATER PRESURE
review.reviewText:
The Staff was very friendly, lobby friendly & clean. The room was clean, nothing fancy but functional. However, by far the WORSE THING WAS NO WATER PRESSURE IN THE SHOWER. Also bring your own shampo & conditioner -- as the product they provide is horrible. 
Coffee with the Continental breakfast is good!
review.negativeRemarks: Water pressure in shower!
review.locationRemarks: Walked the streets of San Rafael. Charming little town, lots of neat little shops & great, cute little eating places.

review.title: Vacation at SF
review.reviewText:
Just what we expected, a nice and comfortable stay!
The nice lady, Debbie was very accommodating. We're going back to that hotel again!

review.title: Feces on the bed
review.reviewText: There was some type of feces on one of the beds!!!!!!!!!!! We called them and they sent someone to pick up the sheets and bring us new sheets.... They never came back with the sheets. To make matters worse, the manager said that they would reimburse us on our way out and the next morning, the representative said there is nothing he can do and the manager is not in. I asked him to call the manager and he did and said he couldn't help us. I cannot recommend this place to anyone.
review.positiveRemarks: Nothing... The staff was rude, feces on the bed, and the place was very dirty.
review.negativeRemarks: Better staff, customer service, and clean rooms.
review.locationRemarks: target

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. I am pleased to read your remarks about our friendly staff and convenient laundry room. However, I do apologize that your bed was noisy and that your room did not meet all of your needs. Your feedback will be helpful to us as we continually work to improve our hotel. Thank you again for your feedback. We would love to have you stay with us again in the future.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: Hotel is clean and well maintained. Laundry room is large with 4 washers and dryers. Staff was very friendly and helpful.
review.negativeRemarks: Bed was very noisy. Coffee pots should be in the rooms.

managementResponses.response: Guillermo - Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at our hotel. I do apologize for the cleanliness issues with your bathroom vents. I can assure you that I will be discussing your comments with my housekeeping staff to ensure that your experience is not repeated. As well, I do apologize that your room did not meet your expectations and that we did not provide bottled water. Your feedback is helpful to us as we continually work to improve our hotel. Thank you again for your review. We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

review.title: Great for one night stay
review.reviewText:
Need to clean the vents on the bathroom , call front desk ask about drinking water, the person said drink from the faucet ok to drink, we don't. Supply bottle water. The add from expedia said
Bottle water in the room, nice stay for one night.
review.locationRemarks: Location was to far for my self and no rest. close by

review.title: Nice and convenient
review.reviewText: Everything we needed was nice and close especially having Target right there!!!!  Box spring was a bit noisy when just sitting on the bet though.....   Breakfast was a disappointment however-not much there.  We would stay there again.
review.negativeRemarks: Offer more for breakfast.

managementResponses.response:
James - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay with us. Learning that we accomplished our goal of providing you with excellent service is the best part of our job. We are equally proud that you found your room to be clean and comfortable; however, we are disappointed that our grab-and-go breakfast did not meet your expectations. We offer coffee, muffins, granola bars, oatmeal, and fresh fruit for our guests that do not have time to cook in their fully equipped kitchens. We apologize that this left you unsatisfied, but are glad that you enjoyed your overall stay.

We hope to see you again in the near future, thank you again.

review.title: Playing and hiking
review.reviewText: Nice place to stay. Friendly staff clean rooms. High price for what you get. Great location to do a million things..
review.positiveRemarks: The full kitchen s major plus.
review.negativeRemarks: Better breakfeast..
review.locationRemarks: 10 min to all kind of state parks. 20 min to the mountain hiking area. 5 mins from down town night life and great food.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience during your recent stay. We are glad that you found our hotel to be clean; however, we are sorry that you did not find your mattress to be comfortable. We will be inspecting our mattresses to make sure they are meeting our comfort standards. We also apologize that our towel exchange policy did not leave you pleased. We are a green hotel, this is the reason why we exchange our guests' towels; it also allows us to pass the savings on to our guests. For those guests interested, we do offer different programs in which we offer daily maid service. We are sorry that this was not explained to you at check-in. We will be working with our front desk staff to ensure that we are fully informing our guests of our available amenities.

Thank you again for your feedback. We hope you will stay with us in the future so we can provide you with a better experience.

review.title: Disappointing hotel beds.
review.reviewText: The hotel was just okay, but the beds were terrible.  The beds were noisy and uncomfortable.  The bed was so bad, my back hurt after my stay.  Night shift staff was not very accommodating.  The towels were flimsy and you had to personally exchange dirty towels to get clean towels.
review.positiveRemarks: Hard to identify good attributes, but the hotel was clean.
review.negativeRemarks: Many areas could be improved, the beds, the towels and exchange, as well as a nonfunctioning elevator.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are so pleased to hear that you had a fantastic stay and truly appreciate that you would recommend our hotel.

We look forward to welcoming you back, hopefully in the very near future. Thank you again.

review.reviewText: My experience here was fantastic. I would definitely recommend it to anyone visiting the area. It's close to Mt. Tamapais and Muir Woods.

managementResponses.response:
Lynn - Thank you for taking the time to give us your input. We are delighted to hear that we met our goal and provided you with a pleasant stay. We are proud of our staff, especially Debbie, for providing you with quality service. We apologize that you were not notified that our coffeemakers are at the front desk for each guest. We sanitize them for your protection and ensure that they are in working order.

Thank you again for your review. We sincerely hope to see you again very soon.

review.reviewText: It was perfect for an overnight stay. I never needed the kitchen but there is one. Debbie at the front desk managed to check me in early. This is also a great freeway close location so it's easy if you need to get out and about. Close to downtown San Rafael and Terrapin Crossroads
review.negativeRemarks: I would've loved a coffeemaker in my room

managementResponses.response:
Paula - Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at our hotel. I am so glad that you liked the service our staff provided and our hotel's location. Still, I am unhappy to hear that our grab-and-go breakfast did not meet your expectations. It is designed to get you out the door on time. For this reason our rooms are equipped with a full kitchen which lets you eat whenever you want.

Thank you again for being our guest. We hope to see you again soon.

review.title: Just o.k.
review.reviewText: All the staff were wonderfully friendly and helpful. The location is freeway close, but that's both a positive and a negative. Complementary "breakfast" was pretty much a joke, but the coffee was good and much appreciated. So, it was pretty much a mixed bag for me.

review.title: Great quiet place. Alittle pricy though.
review.reviewText: Great view. Nice place to stay. Relaxing watching the boats travel by. Very peaceful stay

review.title: Bad smell in the air
review.reviewText: The hotel smelled like marijuana all night. On a positive note, the staff was great, our room was very clean and comfortable. The price was ok for the San Francisco area.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience during your recent visit to our hotel. I am so glad that you liked the parking our hotel has to offer and our location. As for the water, I am sorry we did not have any bottles available at the front desk; however, they are offered in the vending machines.

Thank you again. We look forward to having you as our guest again soon.

review.title: Descent place
review.reviewText: Forget about asking about bottle water, staff said there wasn't any...
review.negativeRemarks: breakfast bar
review.locationRemarks: good location

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience during your recent visit. I apologize for the issues you encountered with your mattress and lack of warm water during your stay. As well, I am sorry for the noise disturbance you encountered. Your comments will be very useful as we continue to improve our guest experience. Thank you for choosing Extended Stay America. We hope that you will return to our hotel, or any of our other brand locations in the future.

review.title: Better than Motel 6,but $130 are too much for this
review.reviewText:
The mattresses are horrible, my back still hurts 2 days later.
No warm water at any time.
Very thin walls, you hear everything that is going on in the neighboring room.
review.negativeRemarks: New mattresses, warm water, sound insulation.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. I’m so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our friendly staff and clean rooms with fully equipped kitchens at a great value. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and it will help us in our efforts to continually improve our hotel. We look forward to hosting you again in the future!

review.title: Good experience to stay here with my dog
review.reviewText: Good staff but limited people. Room was very clean, the room size is enough for three people and one dog. Room has a full kitchen with full size frig, stove and silverware. Their is a place in the back for the dogs to do their business. While the breakfast is not impressive, the Safeway is 10 minute drive away.
review.positiveRemarks: Complete kitchen, dog friendly, gym and pool.
review.locationRemarks: This is an industrial area so no walking distance convenience. It will take 10 minutes to get to the Safeway.

managementResponses.response:
Hi Marian,

Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your feedback on your recent stay with us! It is great to hear you felt at home at our hotel. Our normal practice is to clean the rooms on a weekly basis but do we have programs where these services can be provided to our guests daily. Thank you again for your feedback. We’re looking forward to seeing you again soon!

review.title: Friendly
review.reviewText: The hotel was very friendly and welcomed pets. The front desk clerk Tina loved her job and it showed. The manager was helpful and courteous. Would recommend this hotel and intend to stay there often
review.negativeRemarks: Cleaning of rooms more often

review.title: Needs more attention to cleaning.....
review.reviewText: The hotel room was not very clean. We found a couple of hairs on our towels and it just did not look like it had been cleaned well.
review.negativeRemarks: Cleanliness and juice and muffins at the grab and go breakfast ( this was falsely advertised)
review.locationRemarks: Location was not close to hiking trails but it was close to a pretty running path by the water

review.reviewText: We stayed two nights. Bedding and towels are not replaced until you pay extra. No making up of the beds. The mattress and pillows were better than expected. The pool is very tiny, but clean. Skimpy on soap, shampoo, coffee, any extras.
review.positiveRemarks: It was quiet. For people traveling with pets, it was pet friendly.
review.negativeRemarks: The breakfast was sub par...granola bars, instant oatmeal and old fruit.
review.locationRemarks: Not much nearby, it is in an industrial area of town, we were visiting family, so it didn't matter.

review.title: Would stay here again
review.reviewText: The hotel had pretty much everything I needed. The room was clean, quiet and the staff were great. .
review.negativeRemarks: The "grab and go " breakfast is pretty grim, some healthier options could be included
review.locationRemarks: There are no restaurants nearby, so a bit of a problem if you don't have a car.

review.reviewText: Hair in the sink. Unflushed toilet paper in the bowl.

review.title: Poor value for this place!
review.reviewText: It was a dump. Shower would not drain. No remote for TV. In much need of repair.... Breakfast was granola bars with no fruit to be found.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for your review. I truly apologize for the smoke smell that occurred during your stay and that our staff did not properly handle your concerns. In response to this feedback, our maintenance staff is working to eliminate the smell. As well, I am coaching the staff on how to handle guest issues better in the future and am reviewing our smoking policy's as well.

Thank you again for your feedback. We hope to be of service to you again in the future.

review.title: Decent location, 15min from everything
review.reviewText: Unfortunately, this non-smoking hotel smelled strongly of smoke. The folks in the room next to us were smoking constantly, and guests were smoking around the pool, even after hotel staff were informed.

review.title: Excellent hotel for travellers
review.reviewText: I have now been in two Extended Stay America hotels and they have both been perfect for what I needed! I have two dogs and they made it all very easy.....there is a kitchen for me and for the dogs......this is not a holiday I need to be travelling for other reasons and their facilities are peerfect.
review.positiveRemarks: The fact it has a kitchen....space, good air conditioning comfortable bed, good shower and a bath in the one I am in at the moment.
review.negativeRemarks: The front door was automatic and then the next one wasnt......very annoying when trying to get lots of nags in!
review.locationRemarks: Good shopping facilities and dog walks.

review.title: Great relaxing hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel had the best costumer service, the front desk was very helpful, and the room was fresh, clean, and felt like a home away from home.
review.positiveRemarks: The service, the room, the pool, everything was great

review.title: just as expected
review.reviewText: spent little time in room. Nice shower. Didn't use kitchen at all. AC was quiet. No disappointments.

review.title: nice if you don't mind the smell of smoke
review.reviewText: Decor was nice. Beds were fine. Wasn't there long enough to rate the staff. Couldn't enjoy any of it because of the awful smell of smoke in our non-smoking room.
review.negativeRemarks: Smell

review.title: Cheaper version of Homewood suits hotel.
review.reviewText: It's a cheaper version of Homewood suits hotel. It has everything you need, a full kitchen, pleasant room , tv and even DVD player. I don't have any complaints about the room . It's a good place for a family with small children . The only thing I wish the hotel will have a better breakfast menu. The location was also Strange among commercial buildings and was hard to find at first.
review.negativeRemarks: I smell a cigarette smoke in a hall and at the entrance .
review.locationRemarks: Among commercial buildings

review.title: Hmph...not what I hoped for.
review.reviewText: Beds were uncomfortable and squeaky ... Not enough toiletries.. Breakfast was minimal not even juice or cold cereal avail .....
review.positiveRemarks: Big room. Indoor pool. Pet friendly.
review.negativeRemarks: Beds were horrible. Stay at a quality inn or best western,get more for money and good sleep.
review.locationRemarks: Quiet location

review.title: Poor experience
review.reviewText: Most uncomfortable beds ever experienced. Went because it was pet friendly, wouldn't go back.

review.title: Don't stay if you have a choice, WAY over-priced
review.reviewText:
If you expect a room with a lock and hot water in the morning shower - great. If you expect any other comforts - forget it.
The 'grab'n'go' breakfast was virtually non-existent. There wasn't even milk for coffee - only packaged creamer. I get better refreshments waiting for my oil to be changed. The nearest restaurant of any kind was more than a mile away. When asked for directions, the clerk responded with "I don't know, I *think* there is a Burger King down the road." I didn't see any vending machines of any nature - anywhere.
From previous reviews, I was expecting basic 3 star comforts. But the mattress was rock hard with a crinkly plastic cover, it felt like I was sleeping in a baby crib.
The vent in the bathroom spewed dirty lint all over me after a shower.
When we first arrived at the place (after 8PM), there was vomit on the walkway directly in front of the lobby, and on the entry carpet. I told them about the vomit, but as we left at 8AM the next morning, it was still there. As I checked in, someone was calling to say their TV didn't work and were told that there was nothing they could do..The warning bells started going off in my head right then. Even though my room was completely paid for in advance, they were vague about what constituted 'incidentals' that would be covered with my credit card # should the need arise, so we dared not use anything.
I pity anyone who plans an extended stay - the place was over-priced and over-rated.
review.positiveRemarks: The water was hot for my shower.
review.negativeRemarks: The rock-hard mattress, the puke in the entryway, and the indifference of the staff.
review.locationRemarks: Dismal - there is NOTHING near it except the freeway. No food, no entertainment, not even a gas station.

review.title: Not up to par for the price.
review.reviewText: The hotel property and inside were very nice. When we reached our room is when we were disappointed. The towels were scratchy, the sheets were not very soft, and the bathroom counter top had tooth paste stains from a previous guest (yuk!)
review.positiveRemarks: The grounds and public spaces were nice!
review.negativeRemarks: The bathroom was dirty and the towels were scratchy.
review.locationRemarks: It's close to the freeway for easy on and off access.

review.title: Bad choice
review.reviewText:
Hotel just ok Lobby needed vacuuming Same the next day Had not been done over night.
We travel a LOT and this has to be the Worst excuse for a breakfast I have ever seen! Not even a pitcher of water! First time at this chain Never again

review.title: Extended Stay - San Rafael
review.reviewText: Hotel is great, clean, attractive, very convenient to transportation options. They do need to add a few fresh and improved choices to the contintenal breakfast.

review.title: Extended Stay is a Great Find
review.reviewText: each room has a kitchenette. very tidy and enough space to feel comfortable. Overall a very convenient and nice place.
review.negativeRemarks: Freeway nearby
review.locationRemarks: Very Convenient. Close to the ferry and other transportation.

review.title: Great night's sleep!
review.reviewText: The room was clean, pleasant and spacious. The hotel was easy to get to with ample parking. Will stay there again.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Nice hotel, it has a laundry room and a kitchenette in the room, which is great for a family. Close to San Francisco, but very affordable. Breakfast was very basic.

review.title: Outdated, uncomfortable bedding.
review.reviewText:
Outdated, hard mattresses with lumpy pillow mattress covers.
Old plastic type bedspreads and blankets.
Insufficient parking on hotel property. Alternative parking was in a hidden away business office center far from the nearest hotel entrance.
review.negativeRemarks: Bedding
review.locationRemarks: Easy on and off I-580

review.title: The perfect room for the price
review.reviewText:
A great price for the room, which included fridge and stove/oven. A bit thin on kitchen supplies, but plenty of towels etc. Extras of everything available at the front desk, including tooth brush, razor etc, and even popcorn.

Our room was booked a smoking and the clerk moved us to a non smoking room~very nice! A good size so the two little ones were able to run around a bit, and having the kitchen there worked out so well.

Convenient to all parts of Marin. Such a beautiful part of the country!

review.title: Nice place to stop and lay your head
review.reviewText: The hotel is nice. There is a kitchenette and full fridge which is great if you travel with a ice chest. There is no ice machine in the facility so be sure to purchase a bag of ice when leaving from the near by gas station. The pool is semi-indoor. It allows the breeze from outside to enter through, and the jacuzzi is small but nice. The staff here were all very nice and accommodating. The rooms are clean, however the bed is not the most comfy thing in the world, with would benefit from one of those foamy egg carton. Overall I would recommend this hotel to anyone traveling on a budget, Northern Cali can be quite pricey, but staying here you wont have to sacrifice on quality.

review.title: Meh, I've had much better for the $$$
review.reviewText: The room is nice enough but the beds and pillows were hard as a rock. I could barely sleep because of the pillows and the close proximity to the freeway.

review.title: enjoyed my stay and would visit again
review.reviewText:
The room was spacious, clean, and comfortable. The hotel was clean, large and had lots of extras. The hotel staff was very nice and helpful. Had a very nice stay and would stay again.

Hotel a little tricky to get to because Yahoo Maps is not updated. Called hotel and the hotel staff was very helpful and got us quickly to the hotel. Recommend calling the for directions since Yahoo Maps gave us wrong directions.
review.locationRemarks: Right off 580. Easy freeway access. Close to 101. Enjoyed going to Sausalito, San Francisco and Novato

review.title: Not Bad...Warm up the Pool Please!
review.reviewText: Not a bad experience. Indoor pool was too cold. Need to keep it a little warmer. Room was nice but could have been a little cleaner.

review.title: Centrally Located
review.reviewText: The room was clean and well kept. The staff was in good spirits and helpful. The only thing that bothered me was the horrible cigarette smell in the hallways. I was staying on a floor that appeared to be non-smoking. However I don't think the staff could have done much to control smokers that go out into the hall to smoke. Perhaps if this hotel could invest in air purifies for the hallway I would have given them full starts. I would however stay here again. It is centrally located to where I need to be.

review.title: it was okay place to shower and sleep
review.reviewText: we found broken window parts in the bushes "half a window" by the parking lot. trash here and there in the back. difficult to find the place.
review.negativeRemarks: no place to eat without leaving your place
review.locationRemarks: tricky to find

review.title: Not bad, but no free Wifi
review.reviewText: Even though hotel info page said free Wifi, once we arrived we were told it would cost $5 per day. Also, be aware that pets are allowed here with no size restrictions. A party on our floor had two large dogs with them which were noisy one morning.
review.positiveRemarks: Easy, no fuss. Coffee bar in the morning is great

review.title: Don't stay here
review.reviewText: There were blood stains on the sheets. That's all I need to say.

review.title: Victor
review.reviewText: I have stayed at better extended stays where the rooms are more modern at a lower price. Took us 30 minutes to check in because system issues.

review.title: Very Impressed, Exceptional Value
review.reviewText: Great value, clean and well appointed. Very satisfied. I would recommend this hotel.

review.title: Easy highway access
review.reviewText:
My husband and I stayed overnight to see Diana Ross in concert at the Veteran's Memorial Center. The hotel was a 10 minute mostly freeway drive so it was convenient. The location was more industrial so if you wanted to walk to stores or shopping this is not the spot for you.

The kitchenette and full apartment size refrigerator was a bonus. Please note: on weekends they only serve morning tea & coffee, no food.

review.title: I would stay again
review.reviewText: Nice place

review.title: Im there at least twice a month.
review.reviewText: I love the location, the rooms are great, specialy because i travel with my 4yr old son.

review.title: Great value stay
review.reviewText: A great value hotel with clean rooms and close to central San Rafael. The staff were friendly and helpful. What more can you ask for!

review.title: i'll def be back soon
review.reviewText: my daughters live in the bay area and i've had trouble finding a nice hotel for my visits......this one is perfect

review.title: Pretty good value
review.reviewText:
Room was quiet, comfortable, and clean. The fire alarm went off at 1:00 in the morning (someone burned the toast). It took about 1/3 hr to get the alarms shut off. The night mgr did not seem to be trained to reset the fire alarm, so we had to wait for the fire dept to do so. Otherwise a good stay. Note: The continental breakfast is not served on weekends. A minor inconvenience.
Otherwise for the price -a good value. the check-in mgr has a nice wry sense of humor. Beds are comfortable. Some might not like the faux wood flooring in the kitchen & bath but I like it and feel it is more sanitary than carpet. The $5 fee for the internet is a pain, but then again the room rate is reasonable.

review.title: Screaming
review.reviewText: First Anniversary so we went to dinner and when we returned to the hotel our key would not open the door. We went back to the front desk where there was a man screaming at staff and had the door ket reset-back to the room and no luck-back to the front desk and the still screaming man for a new key-back to the room and no luck- back to the front desk and the still screaming man with a bunch of his companions milling around-one desk clerk accompanied us to the room and attempted to open the door-no luck. At this point we were put into another room to wait while the maintenance man was contacted -two hours later the battery was changed in the door mechanism and the door was opened- man still screaming in lobby andf strong cooking odors permiated the hallway. Happy Anniversary honey and, no we cannot go back there for Anniversary #2

review.title: Great hotel at a bargain price!
review.reviewText: This hotel was very clean and comfortable. We could not believe the price we got, when we saw the standard rates posted on the door. What a deal! It was a little way off the main strip of San Rafael, but once we found it the first time it was convenient enough. We felt safe, even though off the beaten path, which is important as this was a Mom and daughter trip with my 2 young daughters. We also had our small dog, and I felt quite safe taking him out for a walk even at night. It was great that such a quality hotel allows pets, and we appreciate that a lot!

review.title: uncomfortable sleep
review.reviewText: Facilities were pleasant. Breakfast was weak in that there were stale food items, (fruit was good though) and there was little to drink other than coffee, (juice was only available one of 5 days. My kids and I enjoyed the indoor pool, (warm and empty). In general the room was pleasant but the beds were the most uncomfortable hard, springy things I have ever experienced. I would recommend asking for the larger room as initially we only had a hot plate type device and the larger room has an oven, etc...We asked the front for a late check out which was approved by the front a.m. manager but we had a rude knock on the door at 12:00 asking when we were leaving...after explanation they were OK.

review.title: OK-but probably could find better
review.reviewText: Pros: Room was very clean and it was nice to have the fridge/micro. Pool/hot tub were nice. Continental breakfast was OK, not great. No drinks for the kids. On-site laundry room was nice as we were traveling with 4 kids and had been away from home for several days. Location was decent. Cons: The beds were AWFUL! We didn't realize you had to pay extra to have the room cleaned every day. We probably wouldn't stay at another one of these hotels unless there wasn't anything else around.

review.title: Not Impressed
review.reviewText: Main reason for staying - 80th Birthday celebration and had a pool - and at their price figured it would be very nice. NEGATIVES: Arrived, pool was out of service. Was informed by live-in residents, pool had been down for months. Should have been noted somewhere or told when confirmation was made. Beds were TERRIBLE. We all suffered backaches - ages 80 through 17. Small flat screen TV. We had to pay EXTRA for change of towels; and beds to be made. Even MORE for room cleaning service. Possitve: Informed clerk parent had a heart condition and could not be placed on top floors - we were accommodated a room/suite in the bottom floor. Would NOT recommend at their prices. We have stayed at other hotels on their street. San Rafael North Bay Inn is by far the nicest with exception of no pool. Large flat screen TV. Comfortable beds. They provide all room service/amenities at no extra charge; bottled water for all guests everyday of your stay; and provide continental breakfast with pastries, fruits, along with assorted coffee and hot chocolate. And rooms are at a very reasonable price.

review.title: A few minor problems, but nice
review.reviewText: My complaints are that it wasn't clear to me there is an additional charge for internet access in the room. There was a plumbing problem in the first room, and my room was changed promptly. The plumbing problem in the second room didn't surface until the second day,and because it was livable, I didn't report it. Otherwise, it was excellent.

review.title: Location is poor
review.reviewText: The hotel itself is fine. However it is in an industrial area. In the evening, it does appear safe to walk around. You need to drive into San Rafael to find resturants and entertainment.

review.title: Condition
review.reviewText: The deadbolt did not work. They had to bring in someone to fix it -- it had obviously never worked properly. The refrigerator had not been cleaned. There was 1/2 of a watermelon still in it and some jelly. The toilet was not properly cleaned. There was no soap to wash the dishes. The tissue box was down to the last couple of tissues. The toilet paper was completely out. There were no shear curtains to block the view from outsiders while still letting in light. There was no shampoo. Children were being allowed to use both computers preventing legitimate business use of them. The next day one of the computers could not access the internet. I understand that some of the amenities provided in hotels that cater to just a couple of nights stay may not apply to ESA (we stayed thursday and friday nights) but then why were we charged more for a friday night stay but not provided with those amenities, i.e. shampoo, towels, sheets, etc.?
